resources.string:
Sometimes life can get really hectic and we start forgetting things that we should remember such as assignments for school, groceries, walking the dog, and even picking up kids from school. 

To help with this major problem the team here at I Forgot are working hard to bring an app to solve this problem once and for all. 

Donâ€™t Forget! Is the app that will keep track of every important event in your life and will make sure that you will never be late for anything ever again!
